entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor-server sign in option. #39928
  • Support XML-based OpenAPI docs for minimal APIs #39927
    .NET 7 Planning
  • AuthenticationService.js 404 not found in Blazor Multi Application #39922
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921
  • Route order not respected for "*" host #39920
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #39919
  • cachedFunction of JSInterop causes memory leaks #39918
  • Should `failureMessage` in `AuthenticateResult` be nullable? #39916
  • OutOfMemoryException caused by user-code in ASP.NET Core runtime #39913
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware doesn't always log request body #39911
  • LogLevel Warning is somewhat verbose for LoggerEventIds.VerifyUserTokenFailed in the UserManager #39910
  • EnableAuthenticatorModel shows page even if user was not found #39909
  • Why BadHttpRequest is logged twice (as INFO and ERROR) #39907
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: The provided expression contains a PropertyExpression which is not supported. FieldIdentifier only supports simple member accessors (fields, properties) of an object #39906
    5.0.x
  • IIS: Using Windows Authentication assigns ClaimsPrincipal to User if AuthenticationSchemes are defined in an AuthorizationPolicy #39901

Closed

  • Twitter OAuth2 support #39664
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes #39902
  • Develop RDLC Generating Library for Cross Plateform #39912
  • Hot reload runs stale build #37136
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.SignalRClientTest` #39914
  • Locking issues with multiple dotnet watch processes with shared dependencies #38800
  • With .NET 7.0 SDK, I cannot create .NET 6.0 web project, the target net6.0 can't be found. #39731
    7.0-preview1
  • I have this issue with asp.net run in the back-end #39844
  • FromServices in MVC package instead of DependencyInjection? #39881
  • SignalR can't invoke server method from client with throttled connection #39885
  • Perf regression: endpoint #39883

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding support to infer FromServices parameters #39926
    area-mvc
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #39924
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #39923
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39905
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39904
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Extend disable component governance for linux #39925
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39681
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39903
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 3.1 #39467
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.23
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.2.22078.1 #39895
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Disable component governance in Linux_musl_x64_build #39898
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo #39780
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Inferring FromServices optionality #39804
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Make UseUrls() override default hosting config #39836
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.3
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 5 #39464
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • Proposal for how we handle more metadata for auth #39892
    area-security
  • Reduce build steps in our pipelines #39899
    area-infrastructure
  • Delay closing SignalR connections on shutdown #34438
    area-signalr
